channel.title: About on Marianna Lovato
channel.description: Recent content in About on Marianna Lovato

item.title: About
item.description: My PhD project My current PhD project, titled The rules of the game: How to bargain and win at the EU negotiating table - Understanding negotiation effectiveness in EU foreign policy, investigates the reasons why certain member states are more successful than others in influencing EU foreign policy negotiations. I am focusing in particular on Common Foreign and Security Policy and Commond Security and Defense Policy (CFSP/CSDP) negotiations, including the policy debate on PESCO, operation EUBAM Libya, the sanctions against Russia and operation EUNAVFORMED IRINI.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact me: Email: marianna.lovato@ucdconnect.ie Twitter: @lovatomary_95 LinkedIn: Marianna Lovato

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Undergraduate tutoring Since the start of my PhD, I have been tutoring undergraduate modules offered at the School of Politics and International Relations. As part of my teaching responsibilities, I prepare and deliver 50-minute tutorial sessions in line with the module coordinator’s instructions, I hold regular office hours, correspond with students and grade midterm essays as well as final exams. Academic term Course Details Spring 2021 Comparative Politcs (POL20020) Second-year undergraduate course.
